mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.`name`, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.state, a.order_by orderBy, a.parent_id pId, false lay_is_open FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.state != 4
AND a.name LIKE '%${name}%'
AND a.parent_id = #{parentId}
ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT a.id FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.name = #{name} AND a.state != 4
SELECT a.id FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.name = #{name} AND a.id != #{id} AND a.state != 4
mapper.insert: INSERT into knowlg_type (id, name, order_by, state, create_id, create_time, parent_id) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{orderBy}, #{state}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) simpleNum FROM knowlg_type WHERE parent_id = #{parentId}
SELECT a.state FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.name, b.name pName, CASE a.parent_id WHEN '0' THEN '一级类型' ELSE '二级类型' END pId FROM knowlg_type a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type b ON a.parent_id = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.order_by thisOrderBy, b.id, b.order_by prevOrderBy FROM knowlg_type a, knowlg_type b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.parent_id = b.parent_id AND a.order_by > b.order_by AND b.state != '4' ORDER BY b.order_by DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.order_by thisOrderBy, b.id, b.order_by prevOrderBy FROM knowlg_type a, knowlg_type b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.parent_id = b.parent_id AND b.order_by > a.order_by AND b.state != 4 ORDER BY b.order_by ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.id, a.name FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.state = 2 ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT a.id, a.name FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.state = 2 AND a.parent_id = '0' ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT a.id, a.name FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.state != 4 AND a.parent_id = '0' ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT a.id, a.name FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.state = 2 AND a.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT CASE a.parent_id WHEN '0' THEN '' ELSE a.parent_id END parentId FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.name FROM knowlg_type a WHERE a.state != 4 AND a.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
